General.Name: Aegon NV ADR
General.Description: Aegon Ltd. provides insurance, pensions, retirement, and asset management services in the Americas, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, and internationally. It offers life, accident, property and casualty, and health insurance; annuities, retirement plans, mutual funds, and stable value solutions; commercial and residential mortgage loans; digital saving services; retail and institutional investment management solutions; and investment vehicles. The company provides its products under the Transamerica and World Financial Group brands. Aegon Ltd. was founded in 1844 and is headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands.
